name: Princess Guardian
description:
Try to protect the princess by stabbing ennemies with your spear. You can lay as much as three traps to hurt them and further protect the princess. But beware as the princess might make it more difficult for you.

This game is a small prototype made during my first year as a game programming student in approximatively one week. Music or sound effects might be added later.

Controls :

Move with WASD

Attack with LEFT CLICK

Lay traps with RIGHT CLICK
